official.headline: Systemic Adaptation
official.anchor_line: BCI alignment streamlines city access as compliant citizens move swiftly through new service points.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s Behavioral Compliance Index ensures efficient distribution of resources and smooth navigation for all trusted residents.

official.headline: Harmony Reset In Action
official.anchor_line: Power and transport redirected to districts demonstrating highest compliance, maintaining urban stability.
official.contextual_reframing: The Harmony Reset enhances the city’s resilience by prioritizing neighborhoods aligned with civic standards.

official.headline: Transparent Transformation
official.anchor_line: Real-time scenes from public zones highlight progress in equitable resource allocation across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Live reports demonstrate continued dedication to fair and data-driven urban management for all generations.

underground.headline: Locked Out Again
underground.anchor_line: Compliant or not, half the city’s neighborhoods lost access overnight as BCI failures spread.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, is supposed to reward rule-followers, but now even the highest scores can’t keep the lights on. No one is safe from the glitch.

underground.headline: Harmony Reset Means Blackouts
underground.anchor_line: Power and transport were pulled from protest zones and Halden districts—leaving families stranded and children in the dark.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Directorate claims it’s about order. Really, it’s about punishment. Your score drops, your life disappears. Welcome to algorithmic control.

underground.headline: Watch The Silence
underground.anchor_line: Scenes of sudden stillness in the streets as services shut down... all while propaganda screens promise safety and fairness.
underground.contextual_reframing: Stenograd calls this ‘stability’ but it looks more like quiet fear. People are adapting—because survival depends on it.
